amendment.description: Amendment prohibits new energy leasing or related activities within boundaries of designated National Monuments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to prevent funds in the bill from being expended to conduct preleasing, leasing and related activities under either the Mineral Leasing Act or the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act within the boundaries of a National Monument.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 173 (Roll no. 180).
